"A.P.241/3/22 12:00": "Welcome back! Was it nice seeing Oracle again after so long? Are you moving around OK?"
"Well, if you have any trouble, I'm more than willing to listen and give you a hand!"

"All part of the job description for
<%me>'s personal operator, Xiera!"
"Let's continue from where we left off. The ARKS headquarters have an important request. Please listen closely:"

"<%me>! It's been a while! It's Ulc. Do you remember
me? This might come as a surprise, but I've been
made Commander-in-Chief of the whole fleet!"

"I heard that your memory is a bit foggy, so I really
wanted to see you in person. But Xiao's been pushing
a lot of work off onto me, so I've been way too busy!"

"Sorry that I can only send you a voice message.
Next time, I'll make sure to meet with you in person!"
"Putting that aside, I have something to ask of you."

"Recently, there have been cases of unusual people appearing.
They look like ARKS members, but nobody has ever seen them before."

"I asked the Intelligence Division to look into it, but
Casra's report was cagey. I think he's hiding something."
"So I want you to conduct your own investigation."

"In order to gather more intel on them, I'll need you to tag
along with one of these members and keep an eye on them."

"I'm sorry to have to ask you this right after you wake up,
but you're the only one who can go over Casra's head here!"
"And that's the end of Commander Ulc's message."

"I see, so that was the reason why <%me>
was contacted. I agree with her."
"Taking over command from Xiao has been very difficult for our new Commander-in-Chief. Consider this mission a request from me as well."
"Well then, you'd better get ready to depart. Please come to me when you're ready."
"Oh also, ARKS' organization has gone through a bit of a restructure while you were asleep."
"If you want to hear about it, just ask me."
